title: Understanding Physical Abuse
text: Physical abuse involves the use of physical force. Consider what outcomes this force might have on a person.

title: Identifying the Consequences
text: Think about the consequences of using physical force on someone. What might happen to the person who is being abused?

hintAnswer: intentional use of physical force that results in injury, pain, or impairment
title: Defining Physical Abuse
text: What is the definition of physical abuse?
choices: subjective, emotional state characterized by antagonism toward someone or something perceived as causing harm or offense
aggression pertains to behaviors intended to harm or assert dominance over others
intentional use of physical force that results in injury, pain, or impairment
inability to manage or appropriately express emotions
